message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle at $82?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you see if you can do any better?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise again. How about we meet at $79?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you see if you can meet me at $72? I really think that's a fair price for this product.
I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $77?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you see if you can meet me at $75? I really think that's the best price we can both agree on.
